title: Why are Wilmington Police Officers allowed to use Wilmington PD patrol cars to commute to work from as far out as Hampstead and Rocky Point?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question.  http://www.myreporter.com/2010/06/why-are-police-allowed-to-drive-the-police-cars-home-when-they-live-in-another-county/
